      • getKars

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getKars()
                                  throws javax.management.MBeanException
        List the installed KAR files.
        Returns:
        the list of KAR files.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - in case of listing failure.

      • create

        void create(java.lang.String repoName,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> features)
        Create a kar file for a list of feature repos
        Parameters:
        repoName - the name of features repository
        features - the features to include in the kar

      • install

        void install(java.lang.String url)
      throws javax.management.MBeanException
        Install a KAR file from the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the KAR URL.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - in case of installation failure.

      • install

        void install(java.lang.String url,
             boolean noAutoStartBundles)
      throws javax.management.MBeanException
        Install a KAR file from a given URL and decide to start or not the bundles.
        Parameters:
        url - the KAR URL.
        noAutoStartBundles - true to not automatically start the bundles, false else.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - in case of installation failure.

      • uninstall

        void uninstall(java.lang.String name)
        throws javax.management.MBeanException
        Uninstall a KAR file.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the KAR file.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - in case of uninstall failure.
